H0.text: What is the international telephone dialling code for Germany. 43

H1.text: What is the international telephone dialling code for Germany. 44

H2.text: What is the international telephone dialling code for Germany. 45

H3.text: What is the international telephone dialling code for Germany. 49

A4.text: In 1992, two years after reunification, the telephone networks were merged under country code 49.
